trans-unit.source: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个使用协商安全协议的流，以便对客户端-服务器通信中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>客户端和服务器之间传输的身份验证和协助保护的信息的类。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>, you can do the following.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>，你可以执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation.
trans-unit.target: 为模拟或委托向服务器发送客户端的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Request server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 请求服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it.
trans-unit.target: 加密和/或签名前将其传输的数据。

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information.
trans-unit.target: 在将信息传输之前，必须执行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Clients request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: 客户端请求进行身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，身份验证完成之前阻止，或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，不会阻止等待身份验证完成时。

trans-unit.source: Servers request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务器请求进行身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 客户端和服务器上，（可选） 进行身份验证使用 Negotiate 安全协议。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 95/98 系统中，Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) 是用于身份验证的协议。

trans-unit.source: On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used.
trans-unit.target: 在 Kerberos 其他平台上使用协议进行身份验证客户端和服务器支持它; 如果否则使用 NTLM。

trans-unit.source: For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/.
trans-unit.target: 这些协议的详细说明，请参阅平台 SDK 文档 MSDN 上，在 msdn.microsoft.com/library/。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类执行使用安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services will be used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> to help secure your data during transmission.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定哪些安全服务将使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>来帮助保护你的数据在传输过程。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the remote client or server using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取有关远程客户端或服务器使用信息<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you will receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你将收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你将使用同步的数据发送<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的数据使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 如果安全服务 （如启用加密或签名），这些自动应用于您的数据<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>将使用在创建时提供的流的数据传输<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 当提供此基础流时，你可以选择以指定是否关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>也会关闭基础流。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the client side of a client-server connection that uses the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个使用的客户端-服务器连接的客户端<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: The client authenticates and sends a message to the server asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 客户端进行身份验证，并以异步方式将消息发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the server side of a client-server connection that uses the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> to authenticate the client and read a message sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个使用的客户端-服务器连接的服务器端<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>进行身份验证客户端并读取客户端发送的消息。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> from closing the stream that you supply, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>关闭你提供的流，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象，<see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> 使用此对象发送和接收数据。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`true`为`leaveStreamOpen`参数，关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>不起任何作用`innerStream`流式传输; 您必须显式关闭`innerStream`当不再需要它。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法，以便对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法，以便对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the client's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证使用客户端的<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器不指定任何服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>, the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>, and mutual authentication is requested.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别是<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>，安全级别是<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>，并进行相互身份验证的请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被尝试作为服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: 用于确立客户端身份的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: The Service Principal Name (SPN) that uniquely identifies the server to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识要进行身份验证的服务器的服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值之一，指示流的安全服务。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一，指示服务器使用客户端凭据访问资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法，以便对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的凭据和身份验证选项。

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`对的请求安全服务的使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要让数据进行加密和签名，指定<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>值。

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证并不保证，请求<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>已被授予。

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被尝试作为服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the stream to retry authentication as the client.
trans-unit.target: 不能尝试将该流作为客户端重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: 用于确立客户端身份的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: The Service Principal Name (SPN) that uniquely identifies the server to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识要进行身份验证的服务器的服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值之一，指示流的安全服务。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一，指示服务器使用客户端凭据访问资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法，对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证以作为异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的凭据和身份验证选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`对的请求安全服务的使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要让数据进行加密和签名，指定<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>值。

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证并不保证，请求<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>已被授予。

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedImpersonationLevel" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedImpersonationLevel" /> 不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetName" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetName" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的凭据、身份验证选项和通道绑定。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`对的请求安全服务的使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要让数据进行加密和签名，指定<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>值。

trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证并不保证，请求<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>已被授予。

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> used for extended protection that is passed to this method in the `binding` parameter would be retrieved by an application from <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> property on the associated <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>用于传递给此方法的扩展保护`binding`参数将检索应用程序从<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被尝试作为服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Handles the server side of an authentication for a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 处理客户端-服务器连接的身份验证的服务器端。

trans-unit.source: These methods block while the authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 正在进行身份验证时，将阻止这些方法。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the application from blocking while waiting for the authentication to complete, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止应用程序阻止等待身份验证完成时，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法，以便对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the server's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证使用服务器的<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器不指定任何服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>, and the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别是<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>，和的安全级别是<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法阻止，直至该操作完成。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在操作完成之前一直阻止，使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Windows 95 and Windows 98 are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 windows 95 和 Windows 98。

trans-unit.source: to use the explicit <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用显式<see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> that is used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 用于扩展保护的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法，以便对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的扩展保护策略。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the server's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证使用服务器的<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器不指定任何服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>, and the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别是<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>，和的安全级别是<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>。

trans-unit.source: If the `policy` parameter is `null`, then an extended protection policy is used that has <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`policy`参数是`null`，则扩展的保护策略使用具有<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>设置为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法阻止，直至该操作完成。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在操作完成之前一直阻止，使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> on the extended protection policy passed in the <paramref name="policy" /> parameter are both <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="policy" /> 参数中传递的扩展保护策略上，<see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> 都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.target: 不支持 windows 95 和 Windows 98。

trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="policy" /> parameter was set to <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Always" /> on a platform that does not support extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持扩展保护的平台上，<paramref name="policy" /> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Always" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="credential" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="credential" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requiredImpersonationLevel" /> must be <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Impersonation" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Delegation" />,
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requiredImpersonationLevel" /> 必须为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Impersonation" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Delegation" />，

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已进行了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the client.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被用作客户端尝试进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the stream to retry authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 不能尝试将该流作为服务器重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Windows 95 and Windows 98 are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 windows 95 和 Windows 98。

trans-unit.source: to use the explicit <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用显式<see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: 用于确立客户端身份的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> that is used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 用于扩展保护的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值之一，指示流的安全服务。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一，指示服务器使用客户端凭据访问资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法，以便对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified server credentials, authentication options, and extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的服务器凭据、身份验证选项和扩展保护策略。

trans-unit.source: If the `policy` parameter is `null`, then an extended protection policy is used that has <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`policy`参数是`null`，则扩展的保护策略使用具有<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>设置为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法阻止，直至该操作完成。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在操作完成之前一直阻止，使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> on the extended protection policy passed in the <paramref name="policy" /> parameter are both <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="policy" /> 参数中传递的扩展保护策略上，<see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> 都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Handles the server side of an authentication for a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 以异步操作方式处理某个客户端-服务器连接的身份验证的服务器端。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一，指示服务器使用客户端凭据访问资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法，对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证以作为异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified server credentials, authentication options, and extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的服务器凭据、身份验证选项和扩展保护策略。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: If the `policy` parameter is `null`, then an extended protection policy is used that has <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`policy`参数是`null`，则扩展的保护策略使用具有<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>设置为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> on the extended protection policy passed in the <paramref name="policy" /> parameter are both <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="policy" /> 参数中传递的扩展保护策略上，<see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> 都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="credential" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="credential" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requiredImpersonationLevel" /> must be <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Impersonation" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Delegation" />,
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requiredImpersonationLevel" /> 必须为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Impersonation" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Delegation" />，

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to try to r-authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已进行了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the client.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被用作客户端尝试进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the stream to retry authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 不能尝试将该流作为服务器重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Windows 95 and Windows 98 are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 windows 95 和 Windows 98。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="policy" /> parameter was set to <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Always" /> on a platform that does not support extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持扩展保护的平台上，<paramref name="policy" /> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Always" />。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个异步操作，以对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 正在进行身份验证时，此方法的重载不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止等待身份验证完成时，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委托，该委托引用当身份验证完成时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含该操作的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法开始一个异步操作，以对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the client's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证使用客户端的<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器不指定任何服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>, and the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别是<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>，和的安全级别是<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是异步的不会阻止在操作完成时。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步身份验证操作<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 客户端调用此方法开始一个异步操作，以对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的凭据和身份验证选项。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`对的请求安全服务的使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要让数据进行加密和签名，指定<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>值。

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证并不保证，请求<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>已被授予。

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是异步的不会阻止在操作完成时。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步身份验证操作<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="credential" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="credential" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="targetName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证失败。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已进行了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
This stream was used previously to attempt authentication as the server.
trans-unit.target: 此流先前被尝试作为服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the stream to retry authentication as the client.
trans-unit.target: 不能尝试将该流作为客户端重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: to use the explicit <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用显式<see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: 用于确立客户端身份的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" /> that is used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 用于扩展保护的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: The Service Principal Name (SPN) that uniquely identifies the server to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识要进行身份验证的服务器的服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值之一，指示流的安全服务。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一，指示服务器使用客户端凭据访问资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委托，该委托引用当身份验证完成时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to handle the server side of authenticating a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个异步操作，以处理进行身份验证的客户端-服务器连接中的服务器端。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of this method do not block while the authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 正在进行身份验证时，此方法的重载不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止等待身份验证完成时，请使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委托，该委托引用当身份验证完成时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含该操作的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法开始一个异步操作，以对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the server's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证使用服务器的<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器不指定任何服务主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>, the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别是<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>，安全级别是<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的扩展保护策略。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the server's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.

trans-unit.source: If the `policy` parameter is `null`, then an extended protection policy is used that has <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`policy`参数是`null`，则扩展的保护策略使用具有<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>设置为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> on the extended protection policy passed in the <paramref name="policy" /> parameter are both <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="policy" /> 参数中传递的扩展保护策略上，<see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames" /> 都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用此对象尝试重新进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is used to establish the identity of the client.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values, indicating the security services for the stream.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the operation.

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 服务器调用此方法开始一个异步操作，以对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified server credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的服务器凭据和身份验证选项。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`对的请求安全服务的使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要让数据进行加密和签名，指定<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign>值。

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that, the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证并不保证，请求<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>已被授予。

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是异步的不会阻止在操作完成时。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步身份验证操作<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组接收从流中读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>缓冲区</c>中从零开始的位置，从此处开始存储从此流中读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 要从流中读取的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the read operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委托，该委托引用读操作完成时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的对象，其中包含读操作的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个异步读操作，此操作读取流中的数据并将其存储在指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了加密、 签名或加密和签名，读取的操作将从基础流中读取数据、 检查的数据的完整性和对其进行解密。

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何安全不服务 （如数据加密或签名） 中使用，此方法会启动对基础流的异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是异步的不会阻止在操作完成时。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 异步读的操作必须由调用完成<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类不支持多个同时进行的读取操作。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试开始读取的操作，而另一个读取操作已经在执行对同一个流，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行身份验证，调用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何启动异步读的操作。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="count" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="count" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The read operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 读操作失败。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Encryption is in use, but the data could not be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 使用了加密服务，但未能解密该数据。

trans-unit.source: There is already a read operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已存在一个正在执行的读取操作。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that supplies the bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组提供要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>缓冲区</c>中从零开始的位置，从此处开始读取要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the number of bytes to read from <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，该值指定要从<c>缓冲区</c>中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the write operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委托，它引用写操作完成时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含写操作的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 asyncCallback<c></c> 委托。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation that writes <see cref="T:System.Byte" />s from the specified buffer to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个异步写操作，此操作将指定缓冲区中的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 写入到流中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示异步操作状态的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了加密、 签名或加密和签名，此方法从缓冲区中读取数据、 加密，符号，或对进行加密和签名，以及传输使用基础流。

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何安全不服务 （如数据加密或签名） 中使用，此方法会启动对基础流的异步写入操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是异步的不会阻止在操作完成时。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 异步读的操作必须由调用完成<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类不支持多个同时进行的写入操作。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试开始写入操作，而另一个写入操作已经在执行对同一个流，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行身份验证，调用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 在操作完成时调用以下方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset is less than 0" />。

<paramref name="offset" /> plus count is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.

Encryption is in use, but the data could not be encrypted.

trans-unit.target: 已存在一个正在执行的写操作。

trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the underlying stream is readable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示基础流是否可读。

trans-unit.target: 如果已进行身份验证且基础流为可读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果发生了成功的身份验证，此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>对基础流的属性。

trans-unit.target: 基础流时创建的实例指定<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示基础流是否支持超时。

trans-unit.target: 如果基础流支持超时，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示基础流是否可写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if authentication has occurred and the underlying stream is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> instance returned by a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient" /> 后返回的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous client authentication operation that was started with a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 结束通过调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient" /> 而启动的、正处于挂起状态的异步客户端身份验证操作。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作未完成，此方法阻止，直至它执行。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>或<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式执行此操作，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。
