trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: You must successfully authenticate before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须调用此方法之前已成功验证。

trans-unit.source: Clients specify the impersonation level when they request authentication by calling one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用其中一个请求身份验证时，客户端指定的模拟级别<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate without specifying a <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> , <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行身份验证而无需指定<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>，<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel.Identification>使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Clients authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 客户端进行身份验证通过调用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Servers authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务器进行身份验证通过调用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> 是否使用数据加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在通过网络传输数据前将其加密，并在数据到达远程终结点后将其解密，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: 加密有助于保护的数据; 的隐私也就是说，它可帮助确保，在传输过程中的数据时它不能破译由第三方。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether both the server and the client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示服务器和客户端是否均已进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器已进行身份验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the client when the client wants the server to provide credentials for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端想要提供身份验证的凭据的服务器，客户端指定相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: By default, clients request mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，客户端请求相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The Negotiate protocol selects either NTLM or Kerberos depending on the security protocols supported by the client and server.
trans-unit.target: 协商协议选择 NTLM 或 Kerberos，具体取决于支持的客户端和服务器的安全协议。

trans-unit.source: NTLM does not support mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: NTLM 不支持相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream" /> 使用的连接的本地端是否作为服务器进行了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地终结点作为经过身份验证的连接的服务器端成功地经过了身份验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，或者没有出现，则此属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要与服务器进行身份验证，调用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示使用此流发送的数据是否进行签名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在传输数据前对其进行签名，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: 数据签名有助于保护的数据中; 完整性也就是说，它可帮助收件人确定是否数据已被篡改在传输过程中。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" />，指定基础流的长度。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>对基础流的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this property will typically throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础流是不可查找的此属性通常将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 基础流的运行时类型确定引发的异常的运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持设置此属性。

Getting the value of this property is not supported when the underlying stream is a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that receives the bytes read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组接收从流中读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，其中包含<c>缓冲区</c>中从零开始的位置，从此处开始存储从流中读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含要从流中读取的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: Reads data from this stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 读取此流中的数据并将其存储在指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the number of bytes read from the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，该值指定从基础流中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: When there is no more data to be read, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果再也没有要读取的数据，将返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: 该方法读取的最多`count`字节从当前流，并且将它们存储在`buffer`开始`offset`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行身份验证，调用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置读操作阻止等待数据的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，指定读操作失败前经过的时间。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>对基础流的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性，<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>对基础流的值设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.ReadTimeout%2A> is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that read operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础流已<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.ReadTimeout%2A>以毫秒为单位并将设置为<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>默认情况下，这样一来，读取操作不会超时。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the identity of the remote party sharing this authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关共享此已验证身份的流的远程方的身份信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> object that describes the identity of the remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> 对象，介绍远程端点的标识。

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the client, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity> containing the Service Principal Name (SPN) of the server and the authentication protocol used.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端访问，该属性返回<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>包含服务的服务器和使用的身份验证协议主体名称 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the server, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> that describes the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器可以访问，该属性返回<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>描述客户端。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> is not available, client information is returned to the server in a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>是不可用，客户端信息返回到的服务器<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组提供要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含<c>缓冲区</c>中的从零开始的位置，将从该位置开始读取要写入到流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the number of bytes to read from <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，其中包含要从<c>缓冲区</c>中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Write the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Byte" />s to the underlying stream using the specified buffer and offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的缓冲区和偏移将指定数目的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 写入基础流。

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了加密、 签名或加密和签名，此方法从缓冲区中读取数据、 加密，符号，或对进行加密和签名，以及传输使用基础流。

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何安全不服务 （如数据加密或签名） 中使用，此方法将调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>对基础流。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the write operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当在写入操作完成时，将阻止此方法。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking while the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止阻塞操作完成时，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行身份验证，调用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>类不支持多个同时进行的写入操作。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试开始写入操作，而另一个写入操作已经在执行对同一个流，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates writing to a <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何写入<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset is less than 0" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset is less than 0" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="offset" /> plus count is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上计数大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 写操作失败。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Encryption is in use, but the data could not be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 正在使用加密，但未能加密该数据。

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已存在一个正在执行的写操作。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置写操作阻止等待数据的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，指定写操作失败前经过的时间。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流的属性。

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 对于集合运算指定的值设置<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流的值。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.WriteTimeout%2A> is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础流已<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.WriteTimeout%2A>以毫秒为单位并将设置为<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>默认情况下，因此写操作就不会超时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。
